DOC.brief_summary: 40 patient osteoarthritis knee randomly assign conventional physiotherapy one whole body vibration exercise hand . The duration train 6 week , three time week . The outcome measure WOMAC SF-12 score relate pain quality life . The second outcome criterion motion analysis balance test training . The follow-up 26 week .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Whole Body Vibration Compared Conventional Physiotherapy Patients With Gonarthrosis
DOC.criteria: 3080 year old WOMAC 3070 mm ( VAS ) Gonarthrosis ( Kellgren/Lawrence ) IIIII WOMAC > 70 mm ( VAS ) Endoprosthesis low extremity BMI > 40 kg/m2
